00028 #ifndef MIXEDFILECHECK_H
00029 #define MIXEDFILECHECK_H
00030 
00031 #include <fstream>
00032 #include <sstream>
00033 #include <string>
00034 
00035 #include "util/Convert.h"
00036 #include "RegressionCheck.h"
00037 
00043 class MixedFileCheck: public RegressionCheck
00044 {
00045 public:
00055   MixedFileCheck (const char* generatedFile, const char* goldFile, const double eps,
00056     const unsigned int skipLines, const unsigned int allowedMismatch)
00057     : m_GeneratedFile (generatedFile), m_GoldFile (goldFile), m_Eps (eps),
00058       m_SkipLines (skipLines), m_AllowedMismatch (allowedMismatch)
00059   {}
00060 
00067   bool check (std::string& errorMsg)
00068   {
00069     // Open files.
00070     Verbose::out(1,"Reading in file: " + ToStr(m_GoldFile));
00071     Verbose::out(1,"Reading in file: " + ToStr(m_GeneratedFile));
00072 
00073     std::ifstream generatedStream (m_GeneratedFile);
00074     if (! generatedStream )
00075     {
00076       errorMsg = "Unable to open generated file " + std::string (m_GeneratedFile);
00077       Verbose::out(1,errorMsg);
00078       return false;
00079     }
00080     std::ifstream goldStream (m_GoldFile);
00081     if (! goldStream )
00082     {
00083       errorMsg = "Unable to open gold file " + std::string (m_GoldFile);
00084       Verbose::out(1,errorMsg);
00085       return false;
00086     }
00087     unsigned int lineCount = 0;
00088     unsigned int mismatchCount = 0;
00089     const char* lineEndings = "\r\n";
00090     std::string goldLine, generatedLine;
00091     Verbose::out(1,"Looking for differences.");
00092     while (! goldStream.eof() && ! goldStream.fail())
00093     {
00094       // Skip header lines -- for now
00095       // really need TsvFileCheck that replaces
00096       // MixedFileCheck and MatrixFileCheck
00097       do {
00098           getline (goldStream, goldLine);
00099       } while(goldLine[0] == '#');
00100       do {
00101         getline (generatedStream, generatedLine);
00102       } while(generatedLine[0] == '#');
00103       if (generatedStream.eof() && ! goldStream.eof())
00104       {
00105         errorMsg = "The generated file, " + std::string (m_GeneratedFile)
00106         + ", has fewer lines than the gold file, " + std::string (m_GoldFile);
00107         Verbose::out(1,errorMsg);
00108         return false;
00109       }
00110       // Skip header lines which need not be equal.
00111       if (++lineCount > m_SkipLines)
00112       {
00113         // Avoid line ending hassles.
00114         goldLine = goldLine.erase (goldLine.find_last_not_of (lineEndings) + 1);
00115         generatedLine = generatedLine.erase (generatedLine.find_last_not_of (lineEndings) + 1);
00116 
00117         // Skipping white space, convert each line to a series of strings.
00118         std::istringstream goldStream (goldLine);
00119         std::istringstream generatedStream (generatedLine);
00120         std::string goldString, generatedString;
00121         while (goldStream >> goldString)
00122         {
00123           // Require the same number of whitespace delimited fields.
00124           if (! (generatedStream >> generatedString))
00125           {
00126             errorMsg = lineErrorMsg (generatedLine, goldLine);
00127         Verbose::out(1,errorMsg);
00128             return false;
00129           }
00130           double goldDouble, generatedDouble;
00131           bool goldSuccess, generatedSuccess;
00132           goldDouble = Convert::toDoubleCheck (goldString.c_str(), &goldSuccess);
00133           generatedDouble = Convert::toDoubleCheck (generatedString.c_str(), &generatedSuccess);
00134 
00135           // If both fields are numeric, check for equality within the prescribed tolerance.
00136           if (goldSuccess && generatedSuccess)
00137           {
00138             if (fabs (goldDouble - generatedDouble) > m_Eps)
00139               ++mismatchCount;
00140             continue;
00141           }
00142 
00143           // If neither field is numeric, require them to be identical.
00144           if ((! goldSuccess) && (! generatedSuccess) && (goldString == generatedString))
00145             continue;
00146 
00147           // Quit if there is a type mismatch or both fields are non-numeric, not identical.
00148           errorMsg = lineErrorMsg (generatedLine, goldLine);
00149       Verbose::out(1,errorMsg);
00150           return false;
00151         } // end while (goldStream >> goldString)
00152 
00153         // Require that the two lines have the same number of fields.
00154         if (generatedStream >> generatedString)
00155         {
00156           errorMsg = lineErrorMsg (generatedLine, goldLine);
00157       Verbose::out(1,errorMsg);
00158           return false;
00159         }
00160       } // end if (++lineCount > m_SkipLines)
00161     }   // end while (! goldStream.eof() && ! goldStream.fail())
00162 
00163     // The two files should reach eof at the same time.
00164     if (! generatedStream.eof())
00165     {
00166       errorMsg = "The generated file, " + std::string (m_GeneratedFile)
00167         + ", has more lines than the gold file, " + std::string (m_GoldFile);
00168       Verbose::out(1,errorMsg);
00169       return false;
00170     }
00171 
00172     // Require that the number of numeric differences above tolerance is below
00173     // the defined threshold.
00174     if (mismatchCount > m_AllowedMismatch)
00175     {
00176       errorMsg = "There were " + ToStr (mismatchCount) + " instances where "
00177         + "numeric fields differed by more than the accepted tolerance: only "
00178         + ToStr (m_AllowedMismatch) + " are allowed";
00179       Verbose::out(1,errorMsg);
00180       return false;
00181     }
00182 
00183     Verbose::out(1,"Same.");
00184     return true;
00185   }
00186 
00187 private:
00195   const std::string lineErrorMsg (const std::string& generatedLine, const std::string& goldLine)
00196   {
00197     const std::string msg = "Mismatch reading generated file " + std::string (m_GeneratedFile)
00198       + ":\ngold line: '" + goldLine + "'\ngenerated line: '" + generatedLine + "'";
00199     return msg;
00200   }
00201 
00203   const char* m_GeneratedFile;
00205   const char* m_GoldFile;
00207   const double m_Eps;
00209   const unsigned int m_SkipLines;
00211   const unsigned int m_AllowedMismatch;
00212 };
00213 
00214 #endif /* MIXEDFILECHECK_H */
